review: Works really well with all of my stringed acoustic instruments It has a good clean sound and I think for the price you can not go wrong.
This foot controller is wonderful switch between all four channels and the volume pedal wah pedal and built in tuner makes it the complete package for my line 6 amp!!!

This is a great guitar for the money!!!! It has low action and has a truss rod in the neck for adjustments! The built in tuner works great and plugged up this guitar has a very natural and clean sound. I would recommend this guitar to anyone looking at it!!!!!
Great case very well made and has great padding construction seems to be good and I have no complaints about this product!!!!!
Very good for any instrument that does not have a pick up on it!!!!!! I would recommend this product to a friend!
